summary template

By completing this module, you should now be able to:

  • Identify how organizational behaviour relates to the concept of safety culture.
  • Define management systems.
  • Identify international best practice standards for management systems.
  • Describe the Plan-Do-Check-Act cycle.
  • Identify the differences between process and behaviour management.
  • Describe the fundamental elements of safety management systems.
  • Identify the design and function of different organizational types.
  • Identify the core elements of the management process.

Click the ‘Complete’ button to finish this module and return to the Main Course page. When you are ready, you can begin the quiz for this module. Please note that in order to proceed to the next module, you must successfully complete the quiz.
